title: LA-19-04: Legislation Introduced in the 115th Congress Relevant to the Executive Branch Ethics Program
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/2938290EDBD10A40852585BA005BEC1E/$FILE/LA-19-04 Legislation Introduced in the 115th Congress Relevant to the Executive Branch Ethics Program.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory summarizes relevant legislative activity from the 115th Congress, during which members introduced more legislation that referenced ethics officials than any previous Congress and more legislation that referenced the Ethics in Government Act than any Congress since the 101st Congress.
